snippet: Wrestlers from the United States, Iran and Russia appeared at the United Nations the day before they were to compete at Grand Central Terminal in an effort to save wrestling as an Olympic sport.
abstract: Wrestlers from United States, Iran and Russia appeared at United Nations to defend inclusion of their sport in Olympics, day before they are scheduled to compete at Grand Central Terminal in an effort to raise sport's profile; Olympic Committee recommended in February that wrestling be dropped as one of core sports in 2020 games.
lead_paragraph: Wrestlers from the United States, Iran and Russia appeared at the United Nations the day before they were to compete at Grand Central Terminal in an effort to save wrestling as an Olympic sport.

headline.seo: U.S., Iran and Russia Unite to Save Olympic Wrestling
headline.main: Three Foes Unite to Keep Wrestling in Olympics
headline.print_headline: 3 Foes Unite As Defenders Of Wrestling In Olympics
